text:
When one user logs out and another user logs in, the history stored in the
session is preserved. I've tried this with different users between different
publications. The key is using the same browser with the same cookie. I don't
know that there is any problem with this, as the authentication information is
cleared.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
BTW, what is the history information good for?
Does anybody need this?

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: The history is now cleared when logging in and logging out.
